fpmExplorer:Page.title: Share Extension
fpmExplorer:Page.introduction: The Share controller extension enables you to extend the share functionality in your application.

fpmExplorer:ImplementationStep.title: Overriding the Share Controller Extension
fpmExplorer:ImplementationStep.text: To implement a custom share functionality, you need to override the Share controller extension. This allows you to add custom logic to the share action in your application.

fpmExplorer:ImplementationStep.title: Implementing Custom Share Logic
fpmExplorer:ImplementationStep.text: In the overridden Share controller extension, you can implement your custom share logic. This includes defining how the share action should behave, such as modifying the e-mail title.
